item.title: How do i make
item.dc:creator: @Nashi Nashi
item.description:
@Nashi wrote:

Yea, I would advise using the SRL Forums one since they have the tutorials grouped into Beginner/Intermediate/Advanced, That way you wont get discouraged if you find one too hard to understand, Although you can always ask for help if you don’t understand something =]

item.description:
@exps35 wrote:

there’s a whole board filled with tutorials for SCAR. anywhere from first timers to advanced users will find something of interest.

moparisthebest.com

moparisthebest.com

programming, irc, cars

Here is the SRL forums tutorial library, where I am sure you will find more than enough help with SCAR.

item.title: How do i make
item.dc:creator: @Hybr1d Hybr1d
item.description:
@Hybr1d wrote:

i have some basic knowlage about “SCAR”

here is one of my scripts.

program G0D;

const
Message1=‘test’;
procedure hello;
begin
wait(1000)

Writeln(Message1); // test
end;

begin
repeat
hello;
until(false)
end.

i wana know if annyone has a tut on other basic stuff and how to use pictures let me know =]

Read full topic
